Class StrategySimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • StrategySimulator

  • public class StrategySimulator
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that simulates a number of games following a defined strategy. Reports back no. of wins, losses, game time etc.
    Since:
    2019-02-25
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Bradley Read
